BootstrapTextblock.Title: OpenCms Introduction: Step 4 - Preview in a device

Paragraph.Headline: Preview a page in different devices

Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
Our demo template (the one used for this introduction) is based on the popular Bootstrap HTML framework. As a result, it is also a responsive template that adujsts to the size of the device.

OpenCms features a device preview that allows you to easily see how the page will look e.g. in a iPad or smartphone. Just click on the menu icon on the toolbar, and there select "Show in device > Tablet > iPad (landscape)". A preview is shown for the selected device. To close the preview, just click anywhere outsite the highlighted area.
